About

Genomission, LLC is a scientific consulting firm specializing in genomic data analysis, polygenic score development, and precision medicine applications. Founded by Dr. Yosuke Tanigawa, our mission is to accelerate medical innovation by integrating cutting-edge genomics, artificial intelligence, and statistical genetics. We collaborate with biotech, pharmaceutical, and research organizations to transform complex genomic data into actionable insights.

Learn more about our founder here.

Around the Web

About Genomission, LLC

Genomission, LLC provides scientific consulting in human genetics and precision medicine.

Copyright © Genomission, LLC 2025

Genomic Data Analysis

Our Genomic Data Analysis service specializes in analyzing large-scale genetic data using advanced computational techniques. We leverage innovative approaches, including methods inspired by hypometric genetics, to uncover novel genetic associations and deliver actionable insights that drive research and clinical decisions.

Polygenic Score Development

At Genomission, LLC, we develop and refine polygenic risk scores with a focus on inclusivity. Our innovative approach integrates genomic, environmental, and clinical data to create scoring systems that are robust and applicable across diverse populations. We are committed to addressing historical biases in genetic prediction, as highlighted in recent work on inclusive polygenic prediction models and personalized genetic risk forecasts.

Precision Medicine Consulting

Our Precision Medicine Consulting service provides strategic guidance to biotech and pharmaceutical companies. We help optimize clinical trial design, validate biomarkers, and integrate genomics into therapeutic decision-making.
